nodes.text: Crozo Industrial Products was a cyborg design and manufacturing corporation, renowned as a leader in the field of biocomp research and development. Although their main production lines dealt in cybernetic implants and a host of other similar devices, they also expanded their industry to the development of sensors and communications equipment for starships and personnel. From their experience with cybernetics, they applied their expertise at microtechnology to the development of a diverse line of portable communication devices, and despite its relatively small workforce, the corporation was immensely successful.
